The priesthood itself had become corrupt. Priest after priest filled his appointment and performed his religious duties as an actor in a theater. 


                                    -400- 

Christ was fully aware of the high priest's unworthiness to occupy the position that he did. He knew that he had not the character that would enable God to connect with him. But knowing all this, Christ responded. The true High Priest stood before the false priest, to be criticized by one whom the people detested.
